thread_title: Dad Jokes — The Bot That’s Legally Required to Embarrass You

messages.raw_content:
Need a laugh? Or a groan? Or a dramatic eye-roll from your whole server?

**Dad Jokes** delivers randomly generated dad jokes so bad, they’re kinda good.
Perfect icebreaker for awkward silences and dead VC energy.

✨ **Features:**
* Mention the bot and it responds with the joke
* Random dad joke
* No setup needed

**Made by:** Me

**Required Permissions:**
* Read Message history
* Send Messages

**🔗 Invite Authorization link:** https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=961365558148861974&permissions=67584&integration_type=0&scope=bot

thread_title: Old Man Quotes — Wisdom, Sass, and Occasional Nonsense

messages.raw_content:
Bring some cranky wisdom to your server with **Old Man Quotes**, the bot that drops legendary one-liners like your grandpa after 3 cups of tea.

✨ **Features:**
* Mention the bot and it will respond with random wisdom
* Occasional roast-level truths
* Zero setup — plug & play

**Developed by:** Me

thread_title: Welcome Wizard Source Code — Self-Hosted Welcome Bot on GitHub

messages.raw_content:
Want a simple greeting bot for your server?
**Welcome Wizard** is now *open-source* — easy to set up, clean codebase, and beginner-friendly.

> You can easily customize it
 
📜 MIT License – feel free to tweak or fork it.

🔗 **GitHub:** https://github.com/007codename/greeting-discord-bot

thread_title: Verify Tag - Reward Users Using Your Tag

messages.raw_content:
**Verify Tag** – Turn Discord Tags into a Badge of Honor

Empower your community with Discord’s custom tag feature by rewarding users who wear your tag with pride.

✨ **Features:**
* Secure verification flow through a web interface
* Automatically assign a role to verified tag users
* Fully embedded, ephemeral responses to keep your server clean
* Easy setup with `/config` and built-in help with `/help`
* Promote server identity, reward loyalty, and boost engagement

**Made by:** [Synz](https://synz.xyz/)

**Required Permissions:**
* Manage Roles
* Send Messages

**🔗 Invite:** https://verify.synz.xyz/invite  
**💬 Support Server:** discord.gg/aKWZ7XMVQj

# 📢 Welcome to the <#1287448157466398791> — where anyone can showcase their bot at no cost.

## 🧾 How It Works
This forum is open to **any member** who wants to promote their bot for free.
Just create a post using the **template below** and tag it properly.

---

## 🧩 Posting Guidelines
1. **Use a clear title** (bot name or core function).
2. **Include a description** highlighting what your bot does.
3. **List key features** in bullet points (what makes it special?).
4. **Attach a thumbnail** to make your post pop. (Ideal size: 1280x780 px)
4. **Include your bot’s invite link.**

---

## 🏷️ Tag It Right
Select up to **5 tags** that describe your bot (e.g., Music, Moderation, Utility, etc.).

---

## 🚫 Rules
* **NSFW, scam, nuke, crypto,** and **malware bots** are **strictly prohibited.**
* **No reposting** the same bot over and over. One active listing per bot.
* Keep your posts respectful, honest, and clear.

### ⚠️ Violators may be warned, muted, or banned depending on the case.

---
